AnimationMaxFrameRateSuggestion.en: (Better restart the game when setting it and entered a level)
AnimationMaxFrameRateSuggestion.zh: (建议在进入关卡后调整时，重新启动游戏)

WebAudio.en:
WEB
(plays immediately, but might go laggy)
WebAudio.zh:
WEB
(加载更快，但音频可能卡顿)

DomAudio.en:
DOM
(perfect quality, but might be deferred)

EnterBilibili.en: Enter Bilibili UID(DO NOT ENTER RANDOMLY)
EnterBilibili.zh: 输入哔哩哔哩UID（建议复制粘贴再确认）

WhiteListRequire.zh: 请跟作者沟通获取中文翻译白名单，或游玩木乃伊记忆无尽模式 3 小时

DeleteIllustration.en: If you delete the player you've selected, it will never return.
DeleteIllustration.zh: 如果你删除了选好的玩家，其将不可再恢复。

HugeWave.en: A HUGE WAVE OF ZOMBIES IS APPROACHING!

TNTExploded.zh: 僵尸引爆了你的炸药桶！

PlantCountLimit.zh: 场上不存在超过 <PLANTCOUNT> 株植物

PlantProtection.en: Survive and protect the endangered plants
PlantProtection.zh: 存活并保护濒危的植物

PlantLoseLimit.en: Do not lose more than <PLANTCOUNT> plant<S>
PlantLoseLimit.zh: 失去不超过 <PLANTCOUNT> 株植物

LastStand.en: Plan your defence and defeat the zombies

SunCostCountdown.en: Do not spend any sun for <TIME> second<S>
SunCostCountdown.zh: 在 <TIME> 秒内不花费阳光

ZombieKillCountDown.zh: 在 <TIME> 秒内击杀 <ZOMBIECOUNT> 个僵尸

SurviveMassiveAttack.en: Survive a massive attack in the <WORLDNAME>
SurviveMassiveAttack.zh: 在<WORLDNAME>的一场大袭击中存活

SurviveFightAlone.en: Survive with the only plant you've got
SurviveFightAlone.zh: 使用唯一的这株植物打败僵尸

SurviveWithoutMower.zh: 在不受小推车保护的情况下存活

SurviveWhileTNT.en: Survive without triggering the barrels of dynamite
SurviveWhileTNT.zh: 在不引燃任何炸药桶的前提下存活

SunBomb.zh: 在太阳炸弹的奇袭下存活

MoldColonies.en: Survive without planting on Dave's mold colonies
MoldColonies.zh: 不许种植在布满霉菌的地板上

FlowerLine.en: Don't let the zombies trample the flowers

Potion.en: Survive while evil potions boost zombies
Potion.zh: 在被药水强化的僵尸的袭击下存活

GivenPlants.en: Survive the zombie attack with the given plants
GivenPlants.zh: 使用给定的植物抵御僵尸的袭击

CamelTouch.en: Match symbols to destroy the zombies
CamelTouch.zh: 匹配相应的图案，击溃所有的僵尸

QigongHole.en: Survive while Qigong Blackholes sweep your lawn
QigongHole.zh: 在气功黑洞的席卷下存活

Bowling.en: Deliver bowling balls to grind the zombies
Bowling.zh: 投出保龄球，压垮所有的僵尸

Description.en: Zombies infest one of Earth's earliest civilizations! Tackle mummified monsters and more under the scorching sun of Egypt, circa 2500 BC!
Description.zh: 僵尸入侵了地球上最早的文明之一！现在还是大约公元前2500年，在埃及那炙热的阳光下，解决掉成群的干尸吧！

Description.en: The year is 1679, the golden age of zombie piracy! Keep your booty close, and your plants closer, as the zombies take to the sea to plunder your brains!
Description.zh: 现在是 1679 年，是僵尸海盗文化的黄金时代！把你的赃物保管好，更别离开你的植物们，因为现在僵尸们正要出海捕获你的大脑！

Description.en: Head down the dusty trail for a showdown with the outlaw zombies of yesteryear! Gather up your plants for the big Brain Rush of 1850!
Description.zh: 乘着满是灰尘的马车，前去和曾经是一群法外狂徒的僵尸们进行一场决战吧！带上你的全部植物，应对1850年的这场“掏脑热”！

Description.en: Back to the year 1673, when kongfu culture is prevalent all over China. Are you prepared for the battle between the skilled plants and the experienced zombies?
Description.zh: 回到 1673 年，少林武术盛行天下，身怀绝技的植物对战久经沙场的僵尸，你准备好了吗？

Description.en: In the year 2323, the zombies will have brain extraction down to a science! Can the plants of the future save you from the undead of tomorrow?
Description.zh: 在 2323 年，僵尸们将把大脑提取技术发展得炉火纯青！未来的植物能够拯救你免受明日行尸走肉的侵袭吗？

Description.en: Bring out your undead to the year 948! Harvest mushrooms in the dark of knight and get medieval on zombies from the days of yore!
Description.zh: 来到到 948 年！在骑士时代的黑暗中采摘蘑菇，用中世纪的方式对付那些古老年代的僵尸！

Description.en: Take a trip back to the '60s and hang the ten on the ocean waves! Tides are changing and those gnarly zombies make it not-so-safe to go back in the water!
Description.zh: 回到 20 世纪 60 年代，冲上那汹涌的海浪，尽情享受冲浪的乐趣吧！潮水正在变化，那些可怕的僵尸让海水不再安全，你还敢轻易回到水中吗？

Description.en: Explore the frozen wastes of prehistory and chill out with the coolest zombies ever. Beware the winds or your plants will be frozen veggies.
Description.zh: 探索史前时期的冰冻荒原，与冷血的僵尸在冰天雪地中战斗。当心那刺骨的寒风，不然你的植物就会变成冷冻蔬菜。

Description.en: Discover the vanished city of gold, where sun is plentiful and misplaced zombies abound! Use special tiles for extra sun, for these treasure-seekers are no idol threat!
Description.zh: 探索那座消失的黄金之城，那里阳光充足，迷路的僵尸四处徘徊！利用特殊的地砖来获取额外的阳光，因为这些寻宝的僵尸可不是摆设，他们威胁十足！

Description.en: Stock up on hairspray and rewind to the 1980s! With synthesized music and voraciously radical zombies, this heinous party will, like, totally tax you to the MAX!
Description.zh: 囤上发胶，倒带回到20世纪80年代！这里有带劲的合成音乐，但也有极度狂暴的僵尸，这场邪恶的派对会让人嗨到爆的！

Description.en: The ground thunders under the awful feet of terrible lizards! Dinosaurs prowl the past, provoking prehistoric zombies into a frenzy of ancient antipathy!
Description.zh: 在巨型蜥蜴的踩踏中，地面轰隆作响！恐龙在过去霸占了一切，激起了史前僵尸们古老的敌意，使他们陷入狂暴的愤怒之中！

Description.en: The end is the beginning! Return to moments before you left in a contemporary contest stocked with zombies of every egregious era!
Description.zh: 终点即是起点！回到你离开前的那段时光，接受来自各个年代的僵尸的洗礼！

Chooser.en: Select a card to add to your progression!
Chooser.zh: 选择一张卡片加入到您的阵营！

[EGYPT_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 神秘埃及 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[PIRATE_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 海盗港湾 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[WEST_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 狂野西部 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[KONGFU_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 武林寺庙 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[FUTURE_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 遥远未来 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[DARKAGES_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 黑暗时代 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 晚

[BEACH_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 巨浪沙滩 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[ICEAGE_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 极寒冰窟 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[LOSTCITY_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 遗落古城 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[EIGHTIES_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 炫光魔音游 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[DINO_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 侏罗纪沼泽 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[MODERN_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 现代时光 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 天

[DANGER_ROOM_EGYPT_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 末日金字塔 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_PIRATE_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 死人的遗产 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_COWBOY_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 罪恶孤岭 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_KONGFU_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 八方会武 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_FUTURE_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 明日动乱 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_DARKAGES_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 亚瑟的挑战 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_BEACH_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 提基火炬手 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_ICEAGE_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 冰封沙场 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_LOSTCITY_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 花开庙宇 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_EIGHTIES_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 劲爆节拍 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_DINO_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 脑焦油坑 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_LEVEL_NAME].en: Highway to the Danger Room - Level <LEVELNUMBER>
[DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 登峰造极 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_EGYPT_MINIGAME_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 木乃伊记忆 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_PIRATE_MINIGAME_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 加农炮轰击 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_COWBOY_MINIGAME_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 栅栏故障 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_FUTURE_MINIGAME_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 单枪匹马 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_MODERN_MINIGAME_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 植物迷阵 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[DANGER_ROOM_BEACH_MINIGAME_LEVEL_NAME].zh: 坚果保龄球 - 第 <LEVELNUMBER> 层

[ADVICE_PLANT_FOOD_BANK_FULL].en: Plant Food full! Use one before picking up more.
[ADVICE_PLANT_FOOD_BANK_FULL].zh: 叶绿素已满！拾取之前先用掉一颗吧。

[ADVICE_NOT_ENOUGH_SUN].en: You need to collect more sun to plant that!
[ADVICE_NOT_ENOUGH_SUN].zh: 你需要收集更多的阳光去种植它！

[ADVICE_SEED_REFRESH].en: Seeds need time to refresh before planting again。
[ADVICE_SEED_REFRESH].zh: 植物需要一段时间冷却才能再次种植。

[PLANTCOSTUME_UNLOCK_CONGRATE].en: You've unlocked a costume for the <PLANTNAME>!

[FLOAWERPOT_PLANTFOOD_TUTORIAL].en: Click on the Plantfooded Floawer Pots without plants on it to move between places.
[FLOAWERPOT_PLANTFOOD_TUTORIAL].zh: 点击叶绿素强化后且不承载植物的飞天花盆，使之在不同位置间移动。

[WORLDMAP_PREMIUM_PLANT_UNLOCK].en: Finish this level to bring the <PLANTNAME> out in the Store!
[WORLDMAP_PREMIUM_PLANT_UNLOCK].zh: 完成此关卡后可在商店购买<PLANTNAME>！

[POWERUP_TUTORIAL].en: Use Powerups to defeat the zombies!

[PLANT_DISALLOWED].en: The <PLANTNAME> cannot be used on this level.

[UPDATE_REQUEST].en: Please go to the official website for the latest version (<VERSIONNAME>)!
[UPDATE_REQUEST].zh: 请前往官方网站获取最新版本（<VERSIONNAME>）！

LoadingTips.en: Games completely to your taste are always those made on your own.
LoadingTips.zh: 最符合您胃口的游戏往往都是您亲自打造的。

LoadingTips.en: Want to make a game on your own? Finish your studies first and you won't be regretful for that.
LoadingTips.zh: 想要亲自做游戏吗？那么先完成学业吧，你不会后悔的。

LoadingTips.en: Made with Cocos Creator.
LoadingTips.zh: 使用 Cocos Creator 制作。

LoadingTips.en: Difficulty A is the HARDEST!
LoadingTips.zh: 难度 A 是最高难度！

LoadingTips.en: Press F12 and view the Console window if you witness a BUG.
LoadingTips.zh: 当你遇到游戏漏洞时，按 F12 观察 Console 栏目。

LoadingTips.en: Audios can't change their pitch or speed because the game engine doesn't allow that.
LoadingTips.zh: 由于引擎的限制，音频无法变速或者变调。

LoadingTips.en: Press the mouse wheel to feed a Plantfood!
LoadingTips.zh: 对植物按下鼠标滚轮释放叶绿素效果！

LoadingTips.en: Don't forget that you can refresh a card from cooling down after finishing Wild West - Day 20!
LoadingTips.zh: 别忘了在通关狂野西部第 20 天后可以使用叶绿素取消卡槽冷却！

LoadingTips.en:
You could both drag the carts, 
or just mouse-wheel at the rails!
LoadingTips.zh:
你可以拖动矿车，
也可以对铁轨使用滚轮！

LoadingTips.en: You can change audios' load mode in the Setting window.
LoadingTips.zh: 可在设置界面切换音频的加载模式。

LoadingTips.en: You can modify Key Binds through export and import process in the Setting window.
LoadingTips.zh: 可在设置界面通过导入和导出调整调整键位绑定。

LoadingTips.en: Press the key '<KEYCODE_BANANA>' to activate a Banana Launcher.
LoadingTips.zh: 按下键盘 <KEYCODE_BANANA> 键触发香蕉火箭炮。

LoadingTips.en: Press the key '<KEYCODE_ALL_COLLECT>' to collect all the suns and coins.
LoadingTips.zh: 按下键盘 <KEYCODE_ALL_COLLECT> 键拾取所有的阳光和硬币。

LoadingTips.en:
The game is still under development.
Taste the contents that have been finished first!
LoadingTips.zh:
游戏还在开发中，
在游戏完整之前先体验一下已完成的内容吧！

LoadingTips.en:
Plants that haven't been finished will be replaced with Peashooters.
 Zombies that haven't been finished will be replaced with Basic Zombies.
LoadingTips.zh:
未完成的植物会被替换成豌豆射手；
未完成的僵尸会被替换成普通僵尸。

LoadingTips.en: Characters in the game locate at their shade rather than at themselves.
LoadingTips.zh: 游戏中的角色定位于他们的影子，而不是他们自身。

LoadingTips.en: Plant several columns of Sunflowers as soon as possible if you wish to get sun quickly.
LoadingTips.zh: 如果希望快速获得阳光，可以尽快种植好几列向日葵。

LoadingTips.en: If you'd like to deal with a Basic Zombie using a Potato Mine, put it as how far away a Puff-shroom shoots.
LoadingTips.zh: 如果你想用一颗土豆雷解决掉一名普通僵尸，把它放在和僵尸相距和小喷菇射程相当的距离之外。

LoadingTips.en: Maybe Cabbage-pults study physics better than you do.
LoadingTips.zh: 也许卷心菜投手在物理方面比你学得扎实。

LoadingTips.en: Three-dimensional coordinate exists in the game...Or does it?
LoadingTips.zh: 三维坐标在这个游戏中是存在的……吗？

LoadingTips.en: Bonk Choys act like Cherry Bombs when fed with a Plantfood.
LoadingTips.zh: 菜问释放叶绿素效果时威力堪比樱桃炸弹。

LoadingTips.en: The Store brings out 8 random costumes at most every day.
LoadingTips.zh: 商店每天都会售出最多随机 8 款植物装扮。

LoadingTips.en: Sometimes Twin Sunflowers are not better than regular Sunflowers.
LoadingTips.zh: 有时候双胞向日葵并不优于普通的向日葵。

LoadingTips.en: Sun-shrooms produce slower in the day.
LoadingTips.zh: 阳光菇在白天生产得更慢。

LoadingTips.en: Sun-shrooms produce slower in the day.
LoadingTips.zh: 阳光菇在白天生产得更慢。

LoadingTips.en: Wall-nuts can take one extra deadly attack when fed with Plantfood.
LoadingTips.zh: 坚果墙释放叶绿素效果后能额外承受一次致命伤害。

LoadingTips.en: Mega Gatling Peas might not be stronger than Gatling Peas.
LoadingTips.zh: 或许超级机枪射手并不比机枪射手强。

LoadingTips.en: Scaredy-shrooms feel safe when covered by Pumpkins.
LoadingTips.zh: 胆小菇在南瓜头的保护下很有安全感。

LoadingTips.en: Fume-shrooms breathe with their 'bubble guns'.
LoadingTips.zh: 大喷菇用他们的“泡泡枪”呼吸。

LoadingTips.en: Homing Thistles' projectiles use the formula, a = v²/r, when they are turning to their target.
LoadingTips.zh: 导向蓟的子弹在转向它们的目标时使用了公式：a = v²/r。

LoadingTips.en: Lobbed projectiles reaches Parasol Zombies' umbrellas earlier than nearby regular zombies.
LoadingTips.zh: 投掷子弹会在砸中周围僵尸之前被阳伞僵尸的雨伞弹开。

LoadingTips.en: Mummy Zombies groans differently from Future Zombies.
LoadingTips.zh: 木乃伊僵尸吼叫声和未来僵尸并不一样。

LoadingTips.en: Better unlock new worlds in order.
LoadingTips.zh: 建议按照顺序解锁世界。
